mapper.select: select STUDY_NO as study_no, N_NO as n_no, N_WRITE_DAY as n_write_day, N_WRITER as n_writer, N_TITLE as n_title, N_CONTENT as n_content from s_notice order by N_NO desc
mapper.insert: insert into s_notice (STUDY_NO, N_NO, N_WRITE_DAY, N_WRITER, N_TITLE, N_CONTENT ) values (test_seq.NEXTVAL, notice_seq.NEXTVAL, sysdate, 'cj', #{n_title}, #{n_content} )
